segments.text: I notice the way the light from the window illuminates the scene, making the ordinary seem extraordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It highlights the stream of water flowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor reflects the light in an almost deceptive way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I am quite surprised by how silently all this is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused; she doesn't hear a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the children are remarkably quiet in their cookie quest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to give way under the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart actually races a bit watching him stretch so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching deep into that jar, completely absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's anticipation is almost palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but brace myself for the inevitable crash and splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This quiet scene holds so much impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
